examples.example: 哎呀，别叫我笨蛋啦，我会努力学习变得更聪明的。

translate.english: Oh dear, don't call me stupid. I will study hard to become smarter.

examples.example: 遇到困难不要怕，就算暂时是个笨蛋也没关系，只要坚持不懈去努力，总会取得进步的。

translate.english: Don't be afraid when encountering difficulties. Even if you are a fool temporarily, it doesn't matter. As long as you persevere in working hard, you will always make progress.

examples.example: 大家都说他是笨蛋，可他凭借自己的努力取得了很大的成就，让所有人刮目相看。

translate.english: Everyone said he was stupid, but he made great achievements through his own efforts, which made everyone look at him with new eyes.
